SIDEBAR_BOTTOM_SUBTEXT_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Crafting melodious futures, one bell at a time
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_TITLE: Maximize Your Bells: The Ultimate Animal Crossing Companion
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Turn your island into a money-making paradise with our expert tips and tools
FEATURE_1_BODY: Create beautiful, harmonious bells with our intuitive design interface. From small tinkling chimes to grand cathedral bells, bring your musical vision to life.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Explore a wide range of high-quality materials including bronze, brass, and silver. Our app guides you through selecting the perfect alloy for your desired sound.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Preview your bell's sound before casting. Our advanced acoustic modeling technology lets you fine-tune pitch, resonance, and overtones for the perfect ring.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Add a personal touch to your bells with our custom engraving tool. Design intricate patterns or meaningful inscriptions to make each bell truly unique.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Access a wealth of bell-making knowledge with our built-in tutorials and tips from master craftsmen. Learn traditional techniques and modern innovations.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Share your bell creations with fellow enthusiasts. Get inspired by others' work, receive feedback, and connect with a vibrant community of bell makers worldwide.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about making the Bells
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: 'The Bells' refers to the currency used in the popular Animal Crossing game series. Our app helps you earn and manage this virtual currency efficiently.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: How does this app help me make Bells?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Our app provides strategies, tips, and tools to maximize your Bell-making potential in Animal Crossing. It includes market predictions, turnip price trackers, and guides for the most profitable activities.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Is this app compatible with all Animal Crossing games?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Currently, our app is optimized for Animal Crossing: New Horizons. However, many strategies can be applied to other games in the series. We're working on expanding compatibility in future updates.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Do I need to connect my Nintendo account to use this app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: No, you don't need to connect your Nintendo account. Our app functions independently, providing advice and tools based on general game mechanics and user input.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Is using this app considered cheating?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Not at all! Our app simply provides information and strategies to help you make informed decisions within the game. We don't modify game data or use exploits. It's like having a knowledgeable friend giving you advice.
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions about Bell Making
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What are Bells and why do I need them?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Bells are the primary currency in Animal Crossing. You need them to buy items, upgrade your home, and develop your island. Our app helps you maximize your Bell-making potential!
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: How does this app help me make more Bells?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Our app provides daily tips, tracks turnip prices, suggests high-value activities, and offers a Bell calculator to help you strategize and earn Bells faster than ever before.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Is this app compatible with all Animal Crossing games?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: While our app is optimized for Animal Crossing: New Horizons, it includes features and strategies applicable to most games in the series. We're constantly updating to ensure compatibility with the latest releases.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Are there any in-app purchases or subscriptions?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: The basic version of our app is completely free! We offer an optional premium subscription that unlocks advanced features like personalized Bell-making schedules and exclusive money-making techniques.
